saturday.name: Walk-in
saturday.description: We will welcome you in hall X1 of TU Delft X! You then have a bit of time to get settled in before the hacking starts.

saturday.name: Opening Presentation
saturday.description: Here you will finally be introduced to the challenges, and get other important information about the event. If you don't have a team yet, you can form it here.

saturday.name: Start Hacking!
saturday.description: After the challenges have been divided you can now get started on your project. We are excited to see what you will come up with!

saturday.name: Workshop - Elastic
saturday.description: In this workshop Elastic will give an introduction to their platform, and how you can use it for your project.

sunday.name: Morning Gymnastics
sunday.description: Get a fresh start of the day with Cas and Berend

sunday.name: Workshop - Bit
sunday.description: Our supporting partner Bit has a talk prepared!

sunday.name: Pitch Workshop
sunday.description: De Kleine Consultant will come and prepare you for your pitch at 14:00!

sunday.name: Hacking Ends
sunday.description: It has been 24 hours since we started! Now it's time to pitch your project to the jury.

sunday.name: Networking Drinks
sunday.description: Talk to your fellow hackers at the drinks after the hacking has ended.

sunday.name: Award Ceremony
sunday.description: We have a lot of prizes to award here, maybe to you?
